body_html:
When you run ./configure it will ask something like:

Please input the desired Python library path to use. Default is [/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages]

that value is saved in as PYTHON_LIB_PATH in .tf_configure.bazelrc in the root of the TensorFlow clone

It is in that directory that the build is expecting to find keras_preprocessing and other packages installed.
body_text:
When you run ./configure it will ask something like:
Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages]
that value is saved in as PYTHON_LIB_PATH in .tf_configure.bazelrc in the root of the TensorFlow clone
It is in that directory that the build is expecting to find keras_preprocessing and other packages installed.
body:
When you run ./configure it will ask something like:

`Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages]`

that value is saved in as `PYTHON_LIB_PATH` in `.tf_configure.bazelrc` in the root of the TensorFlow clone

It is in that directory that the build is expecting to find keras_preprocessing and other packages installed.
